definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: highway;—´[[מ]] Is 11:16 + 12 t.; cstr. [[מְסִלַּת]] Is 7:3 + 3 t.; sf. [[מְסִלָּתוֹ]] Joe 2:8; pl. [[מְסִלּוֹת]] Is 33:8 + 5 t.; sf. [[מְסִלּׂתַי]] Is 49:11; [[מְסִלּוֹתָם]] Ju Jdg 5:20, Is 59:7; —raised way, highway, public road (never of street in city) Nu 20:19, Ju Jdg 20:31, Jdg 20:32, Jdg 20:45, Jdg 21:19, 1Sa 6:12, 2Sa 20:12, 2Sa 20:12, 2Sa 20:13, 2Ki 18:17 = Is 36:2, 1Ch 26:16, 1Ch 26:18, Is 7:3, Is 11:16, Is 19:23, Is 33:8, Is 49:11, Is 59:7, Je 31:21; ´[[ישּׁר מ]] Is 40:3; ´[[סלל מ]] Is 62:10; in a fig. sense, of the courses of the stars Ju Jdg 5:20; the march of locusts Joe 2:8; the conduct of the upright Pr 16:17; of the ascents to Zion in the mind of the pious Ps 84:6 (LXX: Bae rds. [[מַעֲלוֹת]]).—In 2Ch 9:11 [[מסלות]] is error for ([[ות]])[[מִסְעָד ]] of ‖ 1Ki 10:12.
